definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: She felt a bit comfortlessness to his licentious behavior.
sentences.chinese: 她对他放肆的行为感到有点不舒服。

sentences.english: In a funny way, it was the last day at Highbury.
sentences.chinese: 在海布里的最后一天，这多少让人觉得有点不舒服。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: He thanked his teammates for getting him the basketball in the right spots.
sentences.chinese: 他感谢他的队友把球传到他接得最舒服的位置。

sentences.english: They are often more comfortable and more durable than civilian clothes.
sentences.chinese: 还可以减税，制服更比素人装扮舒服和耐穿。

sentences.english: I can make them all comfortable if you will only show confidence in me.
sentences.chinese: 只要你信任我，我就能让他们都过得舒舒服服的。

sentences.english: You'll feel good to have some soup after a meal.
sentences.chinese: 小朋友吃完饭后要喝一碗汤这样会感觉很舒服的。

sentences.english: During those comfortless, sleepless nights, she read many books.
sentences.chinese: 在那些不舒服而又难眠的夜晚，她读了很多书。

sentences.english: She comforted her husband by putting his feet in a tub of hot water.
sentences.chinese: 她把丈夫的两只脚放在一桶热水中使他舒服一些。

sentences.english: He had nestled down in the sleeping-bag when I came back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来的时候，他已经舒舒服服地睡在了睡袋里面。

sentences.english: I was a little sick on the road trip too but I had some soup and felt a lot better.
sentences.chinese: 打客场时我生了点小病，后来喝了点汤，就舒服多了。
他们有一套舒服的单元房。

sentences.english: Would you be shocked if I changed into something more comfortable?
sentences.chinese: 假如我换一身更舒服的衣服你会觉得震惊吗？

sentences.english: Doctor, I am not comfortable every where, that is, I do not know Shabing.
sentences.chinese: 大夫，我浑身哪儿都不舒服，就是不知啥病。

sentences.english: The cushion is very comfortable and fits on most chairs.
sentences.chinese: 这个垫子很舒服，适合大部分的椅子。

sentences.english: The wrist rests on top of the gel pad providing comfort and support.
sentences.chinese: 顶部的胶垫提供应伎俩舒服的支持。

definition: to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
